name: Wyvern Care
description:
Currently being developed, This sliding puzzle game shall follow the resident of a small dungeon who still stand after powerful beings turned the outside world into a wasteland. You play as Clara, a Dwarven healer, as they accomplish their day to day duties to keep everyone healthy, including one very important baby wyvern who has the potential to heal the world later in their life.

This game currently feature 10 levels that comprise the first chapter and its primary puzzle gimmick of moving and healing the various blocs.

Features still missing to be a proper Demo:

* Art for Title screen, level select and the characters

* Minor story elements

* Smooth transition between levels
